indrAqyAnvRu#javE purOqDASaqmEkA#daSakapAlaqM nirva#pEqd grAma#kAmaq indra#mEqvAnvRu#juq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmai# sajAqtAnanu#kAn karOti grAqmyE#va Ba#vatIndrAqNyai caqruM nirva#pEqdyasyaq sEnA&sa(gm)#SitEvaq syAdi#ndrAqNI vai sEnA#yai dEqvatE$ndrAqNImEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq saivAsyaq sEnAq(gm)q sa(gg) Sya#tiq 
balba#jAqnapIq-  [  ]  40
